Theme.name: blue mend
Theme.menucolor: selection-background-color: rgb(0, 170, 127); background-color: rgb(0, 170, 127, 125); color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

Theme.name: orange mend
Theme.menucolor: selection-background-color: rgb(255, 85, 0); background-color: rgb(255, 85, 0, 125); color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

Theme.name: grey mend
Theme.menucolor: selection-background-color: rgb(105, 105, 105); background-color: rgb(105, 105, 105, 125); color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

Theme.name: dark grey mend
Theme.menucolor: selection-background-color: rgb(47, 79, 79); background-color: rgb(47, 79, 79, 125); color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
